# Resources

- [Adding citations to posts - A minimal example website using blogdown](https://blogdown-demo.rbind.io/2017/08/28/adding-citations-to-posts/)
- [Bibliographies and Citations in R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/authoring_bibliographies_and_citations.html#citations)
- [GitHub - crsh/citr: RStudio Addin to Insert Markdown Citations](https://github.com/crsh/citr)
- I installed Zotero, and [Better BibTeX for Zotero](http://retorque.re/zotero-better-bibtex/)
- See also:
  - [Primer — An Introduction to CSL — Citation Style Language 1.0.1-dev documentation](http://docs.citationstyles.org/en/1.0.1/primer.html)
  - [knitcitations](https://github.com/cboettig/knitcitations)

# Test

* Ok this is a test --- using some random sources I think I used for a paper a few years ago
* I'm using the citr package, Zotero, and the Better BibTeX Zotero add-in

 
  >*Blah blah [see @carranzaJobSearchHiring2020, pp. 3-8; also @dufloFieldExperimentsPractice2020]*
  
  >*Blah blah [@dufloFieldExperimentsPractice2020, pp. 5-9].*
  
  >*Blah blah [@carranzaJobSearchHiring2020; @dufloFieldExperimentsPractice2020]*
  
  >*Carranza et al. say [-@carranzaJobSearchHiring2020]*
  
  >*@carranzaJobSearchHiring2020 says blah.* 
  

OK, works!
